title: Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Delete an app
abstract:
# Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Delete an app
This page describes how to delete an app.
content:
## Before you begin
If the app that you want to delete is associated with a structured data store, an unstructured data store, or a website data store with [Advanced website indexing](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/about-advanced-features#advanced-website-indexing) , you must delete the data from the data store before you can delete the app. For more information, see [Delete data from a data store](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/delete-datastores) .
## Delete your app
The following instructions are for the Google Cloud console.
To delete an app, follow these steps:- In the Google Cloud console, go to the **Search and Conversation** page. [Search and Conversation](https://console.cloud.google.com/gen-app-builder/engines) 
- For the app that you want to delete, click more_vert , and then click **Delete** .
- In the **Delete the app?** dialog, enter your app name, and then click **Confirm** .
